overview: Four Friends Bunty,Qayuum,Nagya and Kashi from Mumbai, who help each other in the time of crisis.Qayuum is not steady about his job, Bunty is a pick pocket, Kashi is an Air conditioner Mechanic and a follower of a Bhondu Baba; while Nagya is a driver, who is dreaming of going to USA.
title: 4 Idiots
